title: Configure custom site slug to AryaTatainsurance

requirements.summary: Set the site slug to "AryaTatainsurance" and ensure shareable URL generation uses a validation-safe slug.
acceptanceCriteria: The slug passes the platform validation rules (5–50 characters; only letters, numbers, and hyphens).
After applying the slug, the site can be opened via the platform’s shareable URL using the new slug without any error messages about invalid characters.
No user-facing text is introduced or changed to a non-English language as part of this update.

file_operations.description: Add/update a non-visual configuration marker (for the platform/runtime) that sets the site slug/domain identifier exactly to "AryaTatainsurance", replacing the previously invalid value. Keep all existing landing-page content and behavior unchanged.

Create a small utility that centralizes the site slug as "AryaTatainsurance" and provides a strict validator (length 5–50; only letters, numbers, hyphens) so any shareable-URL construction uses a validation-safe value and avoids invalid-character errors.

Wire the centralized slug utility into app bootstrap to ensure the configured slug is the one used by any runtime/share-link generation logic, and to fail-safe to the valid slug value without introducing any new user-facing copy or UI changes.
